programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep19
programme.desc: Please Hold for the Next Representative - Yi and the crew are overrun with pings from humans who are frustrated by creatures they now live alongside. Just when they think theyve solved one issue, another springs up and then that original one pops up again too! Meanwhile, we see an ominous pedestal of light progressively become more cracked with each fraught human-creature relationship. At her wits end, Yi accidentally hurts Peng, Jin, and Everest with her magic. She then notices Everest fading into nothing

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep20
programme.desc: Please Hold While We Connect You - In the wake of the previous episode, the magical creatures have all vanished and the world at large has gone gray. Desperate to fix things, the crew travels to the Magical Realm to confront the omniscient Great Watcher, who was a tempting offer for Yi. The kids manage to retrieve creatures, but being back in the human world is sapping them of their magical energy. Feeling responsible, Yi embarks on a dangerous mission to save everyone but its the community of creatures and humans alike that instead come to Yis rescue. Together, they realize that their connections to one another are the most powerful magic of all.

programme.desc: It Flies in the Family - Eugene discovers the Lair and demands a dragon of his own.

programme.title: Dragons 9 Realms Ep19

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep27
programme.desc: Bossa Nova - After Boss Baby is fired from Baby Corp;he attempts to navigate regular baby life in a Mommy/Daddy/Baby playgroup. Even worse;the playgroups other new member is Mega Fat;whose animatronic stuffie Wagby malfunctions and threatens the safety of the whole group. Meanwhile;Tim does everything he can to avoid doing his homework.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep28
programme.desc: The Museum Job - When the crowded bathroom situation at the local museum threatens baby love;Boss Baby leads his new team of playgroup babies on their first missionand then their SECOND mission after a klepto baby in their group swipes a priceless artifact. In a continued attempt to avoid homework;Tim joins Boss Baby on his mission.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep114

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S01 Ep112
programme.desc: The Mystery Bandit - When a mysterious bandit makes off with Blazes metallic trophy, he must track down the culprit in this preschool whodunit!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Zeg And The Egg - Zeg is out smashing things with Blaze and AJ when he finds a tiny dinosaur egg. Now the three friends must embark on an epic journey across a prehistoric landscape to return the egg to its Truckodactyl mother.

programme.desc: Hum-Patrol to the Rescue! / Pups Save Morning Mountain Yoga - When Adventure Bay holds a raffle, a pair of nest-building seagulls snatch the winning prize. // A rockslide leaves Goodway, Farmer Yumi and Garby stranded on the side of a mountain.

programme.desc: Pups Save the Snowshoeing Goodways / Pups Save a Duck Pond - When Mayor Goodway and the twins are late getting back from a snowshoeing, Jake and Everest call the Paw Patrol to search for them. // Water in the duck pond mysteriously drains out, it's up to the PAW Patrol find out what's happening!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep812
programme.desc: Pups Stop an Xtreme Shark - The Pups must save Daring Danny X when a mechanical shark stunt that goes awry.

Luckily, the pups know just how to fix it.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Car Wash / The Crew Plans Grandpa Day - Mayor Greatway needs her muddy motorcycle cleaned fast! programme.title: DORA S02 Ep208

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S03 Ep309

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Lannie's Lights / Assembly Required - When another fishy tells Lannie that her lantern shark lights are too bright, she tries to dim her shine. // The Sharks order a new table and discover they have to built it themselves.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep138
programme.desc: Fancy Dress Party - Peppa and George are having a costume party. Peppa is a fairy princess, and George is a dinosaur. Peppa has to pick which of her friends is wearing the best costume.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep139
programme.desc: The Museum - Peppa and her family go to the museum. Peppa imagines herself as a Queen in the King and Queen's room. George imagines being a big dinosaur in the Dinosaur Room.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep140
programme.desc: Very Hot Day - It is a super hot day, and all the mud puddles have dried up, so Peppa and George play in the wading pool.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep141
programme.desc: Chloe's Puppet Show - Peppa and George visit their cousin Chloe's house, where they put on a puppet show about a pig who snores a lot. Daddy Pig and Uncle Pig miss the show as they are too busy snoring.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep142
programme.desc: Daddy Gets Fit - Peppa instructs Daddy Pig to do lots of exercise to do as he is a bit fat. Daddy Pig is horrified to learn you have to exercise every day to get fit.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep143
programme.desc: Tidying Up - Peppa and George have to tidy their bedroom. After a frenzy of cleaning, the room is tidy. The room doesn't stay tidy for long though.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep144
programme.desc: The Playground - Peppa and George go to the playground. Peppa's friends are also there. Peppa likes going on the swings but George does not because he's scared of heights, so Daddy Pig helps George go down the slide because it is too high and ends up getting stuck.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep145
programme.desc: Daddy Puts Up a Picture - Daddy Pig offers to put up a picture of Peppa and George on the wall while Mummy Pig is out. He accidentally cracks the wall while doing it, so Peppa and George help Daddy Pig fix the wall before Mummy Pig comes home.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Seven Foods / The Perfect Portrait - The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Moving Mission / Barbabright's Invention - During a walk, the Barbapapa family discovers a megalith. // Barbabright has a stroke of genius: the invention of the "BAM".

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep103
programme.desc: The Crew Builds An Ice Cream Shop / The Crew Fixes A Squeak - When a windy day derails construction on an ice cream shop, Rubble, Mix, Wheeler, and Charger are on the chase. // There's a mysterious squeak in City Hall. Mayor Greatway asks Rubble and Charger to find and fix the squeak before her big speech!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Big Bike Shop / The Crew Builds A Super Tub - Rubble and the pups work to build a big bike shop in time for the Bike Festival... unless Speed Meister beats them to it! // When Motor won't take a bath before their family photo, it's up to Rubble and the pups to find a construction solution.

programme.desc: Private Club / Green Algae - Barbabeau, Barbabelle, and Barbabright have built a treehouse. // Barbamama is determined to stop a foul pollution.

programme.desc: The Invasion / Prank Day - Barbalala receives a package and discovers little pink animals inside, which she calls the SQUEAKIES. // Barbabravo, Barbalala and Barbabeau are fed up with their brothers and sisters laughing at their expense.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep125
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Parking Garage / The Crew Builds A Campsite - The Crew helps with a parking problem when Caf Carl's ice cream machine brings lots of cars to Builder Cove. // When Rubble's fear of the dark derails the pup's Bark Yard campout, the Crew comes up with an idea to help him enjoy the starry night.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Treehouse / The Crew Builds A Chicken Feeder - Park Ranger Rose's favorite tree might be off limits for climbing unless Rubble and Grandpa can come up with a solution. / The Crew build a feeder for Farmer Zoe's chickens, but when they get loose, it's up to the pups to safely rescue them.

programme.title: DORA S02 Ep210

programme.desc: The Fuchsia Ocean / Zero Waste - Chemical sprays are making the countryside rosy! The Barbapapas' build an aviary to protect sick birds. // When they see a beach covered with rubbish, the Barbapapa family decides to clean the beach and use the trash to make a miniature golf course.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Shadowland / Medievel Tides - Jealous of Baby Shark's popularity, Shadow rebrands the Wreck as his own personal amusement park. // When Baby Shark and friends are playing knights and royals, Vola wants to be more than just a princess.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep124

programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Dinosaur Museum / The Crew Builds a Wheelchair Ramp - After uncovering dinosaur bones, the pups decide to build a dinosaur museum! // When Omar the Mail Carrier breaks his foot, it's up to the pups to make sure he can still deliver the mail by building ramps all over town.

programme.title: DORA S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Friendaversary Adventure / Swiper's Birthday Surprise - Boots and Dora journey to Banana Hill to bring Isa a Friendiversary gift - a flowerpot that Boots painted himself! // Dora and friends throw Swiper a surprise birthday party. programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Let Justice Be done / The Great Spring Clean - Barbabeau forgot to return his book to the library. programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Barbapapa Tree / The Barbababies' Birthday - Barbapapa and Barbamama return to the tree they were born under. It's in bad condition. programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Gasquatch - Blaze and AJ are deep in the woods when they discover and befriend a mud-loving monster truck named Gasquatch. Now, they must set out on an epic adventure to bring their new friend to Mud Fest the muddiest party of all time.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S01 Ep115

programme.desc: Rocky Saves Himself / Pups and the Mystery of the Driverless Snocat - Rocky must rescue himself when he has been stranded on an Island full of trash by Humdinger. // Daring Danny's new remote control accidentally takes control of Everest's SnoCat and all the vehicles in Adventure Bay!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep521
programme.desc: Pups Save a Cuckoo Clock / Pups Save Ms. Marjorie's House - Jake's family cuckoo clock and is sliding down the mountainside with Chickaletta stuck inside! Ryder calls on Everest to help the pups to save the day! // Mysterious holes are appearing all over Ms. Marjorie's yard.

programme.desc: Pups Save a Show Jumper - Winnie Winnington goes looking for a frog to enter in a frog-jumping contest and ends up needing rescued in a swamp.

programme.desc: My Birthday Party - It is Peppa's birthday, and Peppa has a party.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep151
programme.desc: Daddy's Movie Camera - Daddy gets a new video camera. First, Peppa shows him how to work it, and then he records Peppa being silly.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep152
programme.desc: School Play - Peppa and her friends take part in a school play about Little Red Riding Hood, but Pedro Pony is nervous to be on the stage.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Polly's Holiday - Granny and Grandpas pet, Polly Parrot comes to stay. Peppa and George love Polly Parrot. She is very funny and repeats everything anyone says. When Polly flies away, no one knows how to get her back, until George comes up with a very clever plan.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Windy Autumn Day - It is a cold and windy day. At the park, all the leaves have turned red and yellow. It is so windy that Peppas ball blows into the pond and Georges hat blows into a tree.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Mysteries - The family is watching Detective Potato on TV. Peppa and George want to be detectives too. So,Daddy Pig gives them a mystery to solve. Teddy is hidden and Peppa and George use a magnifying glass to follow a trail of cake crumbs to solve the mystery

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Bubbles - Peppa and George are playing with bubbles. When the bubble mixture runs out, Daddy Pig shows them how to make really big bubbles with an old tennis racket and soapy water. Then he makes a big, muddy, bubbly puddle for everyone to jump up and down in.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Bedtime - Its nearly time for bed and Peppa and George are called in for their bath. After that, they brush their teeth and get into bed. Soon they are fast asleep. Mummy and Daddy Pig finally sit down, but its been a long day and they are very sleepy too.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Princess For A Day / Barbabeau's Adventure - Barbabelle proudly announces to her family that she wants to become a princess. // Barbabravo is moping with boredom, his brothers and sisters are all busy and no one wants to play with him.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Summer Camp I / Summer Camp II - Barbapapa and Barbamama have announced to their dear barbababies that they are going on a trip to Easter Island. // The Barbababies, the twins, and Mr. Strict set sail on "Thse", a magnificent sailboat.

Wheeler and the pups jump into action to build a solution before the big race. // It's Grandpa Gravel's special day! But when the pups are needed, they have to change their Grandpa Day plans.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep104
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Playground / The Crew Fixes A Roof - After Speed Meister builds an unsafe playground, the Rubble & Crew get creative and build a whole new one with old materials. // The town Chili Cookaroo is threatened when City Hall's roof starts to cave in! Luckily, the pups know just how to fix it.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S11 Ep1116
programme.desc: Pups Save the Chicken Conductor / Pups Save the Digi-Tal Stylists - Chickaletta is left driving the train after an enormous chicken floaty launches Ed out the window. // Digi & Tal volunteer at the Pet Parlor. But when they run out of pets to pamper.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S11 Ep1117
programme.desc: Pups Save Fogstock/ Pups Save the Stage Actor - Mayor Humdinger's music festival shakes up Adventure Bay and causes a big mess. // Francois is kicking off a touring production of his play but he is accidentally transported into the woods, and comes face to face with REAL mountain lions.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Watch Out For Barbabright / If I Were A Billionaire - The twins visit Barbabright's room. // If I were a billionaire, what would I do to achieve my dreams?

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep214
programme.desc: The Louvre / Opposite Day - On a trip to Paris, the Barbapapa family will discover the most incredible museum: the Louvre! // Barbalala has decided to respect all the rules of the day of opposites.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep201
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Roller Coaster/The Crew Builds Motor A Play Space - When Speed Meister's rollercoaster sends a pet playdate out of control, Rubble & Crew save the day with a bigger, better, and safer coaster. // The Bark Yard safety inspection is today! But will Motor go boom and cost the Crew a gold safety star?

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep202
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Train Station / The Crew Builds A Sierra Sparkle Sign - Rubble & Crew build the first train station in Builder Cove just in time to welcome Farmer Zoe's new cow Mooreen. // Popstar Sierra Sparkle is moving to Builder Cove! But when the pups plan a surprise greeting, Speed Meister makes a plan of his own.

programme.title: DORA S02 Ep211
programme.desc: The Great Abuela Cookoff / Missing Map - After the Pokey Pigeons eat all of Abuela's elotes, Dora and Boots set out to find more ingredients for the Great Abuela Cook-off. / Dora, Boots and Backpack play an adventurous game of Hide-and-Seek to find Map.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep708
programme.desc: Mission to Mars - NASA's Commander Megan is back! And she's taking Blaze and his friends to... Mars! But when Crusher accidently detaches the rocket ship's thrusters, it's up to Mars Rover Blaze to navigate Mars and get those thrusters back!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Hiccupism / Silence Please - Barbabeau can't paint. He has a hiccup he can't get rid of. Just when he's about to give up, he accidentally creates a new artistic movement. // Barbalib wants to compete in a writing contest but his brothers and sisters stop her from concentrating.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen - Like a secret agent, Barbabravo leads the investigation equipped with his gadgets to find out who stole Barbapapa's cake. // Barbalala is convinced she heard a giant hen prowling around the house. The Barbababies organize themselves to stand guard.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Daddy Shack / Rocky-Bye - After a selfish fish takes over the putt-putt, Baby Shark and William must find a champion mini-golf player to defeat him. // Hank struggles to overcome his fears without the help of his pet rock, Rocky.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Swimming Solo - Mommy Shark demonstrates a power that blows Baby away, sending him on a journey to find the same superpower within: Self-soothing!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1018
programme.desc: Pups Save a Disappearing Flounder / Pups Save Little Grandpa and Mr. Alex - When Cap'n Turbot's ship disappears, the Paw Patrol must venture into the mysterious Adventure Bay Triangle to find the missing vessel. // When Alex and Mr. Porter swap roles, the pups must help track down the Mini-Patrol after they go missing.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Pups Great Race - Its Race Day and the pups are about to race each other across the town to see who is the fastest.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep114
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Splash Park / The Crew Builds A Playroom - With their splash park plans in troubled waters, the pups have to get creative to cool down the town for the summer. // As the pups work on building a surprise playroom for Lucas and Lily, a squirrelly visitor causes construction complications.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep146
programme.desc: At the Beach - Peppa and her family go to the beach, and they do lots of things there including burying Daddy Pig in the sand. When it's time to go they almost leave without Daddy Pig as he has fallen asleep.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep148
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig's Boat - Peppa and George go for a ride in Grandpa Pig's boat. Danny Dog and Granddad Dog are also out sailing. Grandpa Pig and Granddad Dog race their boats to see which is fastest.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep149
programme.desc: Shopping - Peppa and her family go to the grocery store for some tomatoes, spaghetti, onions and fruit, but Daddy Pig gets some chocolate cake for the kids.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep506
programme.desc: Mr Fox's Shop - Peppa and George visit Mr Fox's Shop to buy Granny and Grandpa an anniversary present, but what will they choose?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep507
programme.desc: Shadows - Peppa and George realize that they have shadows and no matter what they do, they can't escape from them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep514
programme.desc: Kylie Kangeroo - Peppa and George meet Kylie Kangaroo and her brother Joey. Peppa shows Kylie how to jump up and down in muddy puddles, but who can jump the highest?

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Barbapapa Tree / The Barbababies' Birthday - Barbapapa and Barbamama return to the tree they were born under. It's in bad condition. They must rescue it quickly without disturbing the nearby animals. // It's the Barbababies's birthday. They all want to do something different with Barbapapa!

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep115
programme.desc: The Fuchsia Ocean - Chemical sprays are making the countryside rosy! The Barbapapas' build an aviary to protect sick birds.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Gasquatch - Blaze and AJ are deep in the woods when they discover and befriend a mud-loving monster truck named Gasquatch. Now, they must set out on an epic adventure to bring their new friend to Mud Fest the muddiest party of all time.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Truck Rangers - Blaze and his friends have joined the Truck Rangers, a scouting club where trucks earn badges for their accomplishments. But when Crusher's selfish scouting lands everyone in a heap of trouble, Blaze must race to the rescue!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep515
programme.desc: Rocky Saves Himself / Pups and the Mystery of the Driverless Snocat - Rocky must rescue himself when he has been stranded on an Island full of trash by Humdinger. // Daring Danny's new remote control accidentally takes control of Everest's SnoCat and all the vehicles in Adventure Bay!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep521
programme.desc: Pups Save a Cuckoo Clock / Pups Save Ms. Marjorie's House - Jake's family cuckoo clock and is sliding down the mountainside with Chickaletta stuck inside! Ryder calls on Everest to help the pups to save the day! // Mysterious holes are appearing all over Ms. Marjorie's yard.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep813
programme.desc: Pups Save a Show Jumper - Winnie Winnington goes looking for a frog to enter in a frog-jumping contest and ends up needing rescued in a swamp.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep106
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Skate Park / The Crew Builds A Tunnel - The Crew has a mishap while building a skatepark. // The Crew helps a pop star get her tour bus to town.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Beaver Home / The Crew Fixes A Road - The power is out in Builder Cove! When the pups find out a beaver is to blame, they've got to build him a new home to bring the power back. // When Speed Meister damages the road ahead of the town helper parade, the pups work fast to repave the way.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep120
programme.desc: Tiddly Phone - Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po receive a call on the Tubby Phone. It's the Tiddlytubbies who ring to say hello, just before the Tubby Phone Dance.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S3 Ep20
programme.desc: Drum - Dee encourages a friend to say 'drum' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see and hear lots of drums - a marching drum, a dancing drum and of course a drumming drum!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep27
programme.desc: Snow Day - Phoebe and her friends are enjoying a Pop Paper City winter wonderland! But can Phoebe help to make a snowman before a snowstorm arrives?

programme.title: Messy Goes To Okido S2 Ep20
programme.desc: Supersonic Messy - Okidoodle is jealous of the new RoboCar, which can go super fast! Will Okidoodle be able to catch up with the RoboCar and earn back Messy's admiration?

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Omelette - Bingo is helping Mum make an omelette for Dad's birthday breakfast, but cracking eggs is harder than it looks, and Dad is getting hungrier by the minute.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Promises - Bluey keeps breaking her promises! But after seeing how much Bingo trusts Mum's word, Bluey learns the power of promises and why it's important not to break them.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep10
programme.desc: The Metal Detector Badge - Roly needs a wee, but the door is locked and Duggee has mislaid the key. Not to worry, Duggee has his metal detector.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep9
programme.desc: The Diary Badge - The Squirrels find a dusty, old book behind a cupboard... it's Duggee's diary from when he was a teenager! The Squirrels are keen to write diaries of their own.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Master of Puppets - At Squirrel Club, there's a story told in blocks, the tale of a first tooth, a fable about changing emotions, and a yarn involving the Squirrels as puppets.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Cool, Man - At Squirrel Club, Detective Puppy solves the mystery of a missing biscuit, the Rabbits tell us what's cool, and the Squirrels help Delivery Chipmunk with a huge parcel.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep11
programme.desc: Himalayan Heroes, Nepal - Hoping to follow in his great-aunt's footsteps, Glitch enlists the help of a sceptical Foz and a friendly yak in order to find a yeti in the Himalayas.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Dance Mode - After Dad eats her last chip, Bingo is given three chances to put Mum and Dad in "Dance Mode" as payback. But the others can't resist taking Bingo's turns for her.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep51
programme.desc: Daddy Putdown - When Mum goes out to a baby shower, Dad takes charge of the girls' evening routine. But with Bluey missing Mum, Dad has to pull out all the games he knows to keep them entertained.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Andy and the Baby Humpback Whale - In this episode Andy, Jen and Scout head to the Pacific ocean, off the tropical islands of Hawaii, on a baby animal mission to see how a baby humpback whale prepares for its 5000 km migration North to the rich feeding grounds of Alaska.

programme.title: Dog Squad S2 Ep20
programme.desc: Mission: Day Off - Sylvie and Katrina stop to help Dawn from the toy shop, Harry the Baker and Pete the Postie on their way to the park cafe on their day off.

programme.title: Aneeshwar And Lizzie Go Wild S2 Ep20
programme.desc: Mandrill and Sand Lizard - Aneeshwar Kunchala and Lizzie Daly meet the mandrill and sand lizard, and reveal their wild connection - they use colour to attract a mate.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S7 Ep24
programme.desc: Captain Captain's Classic Clips - Squawk takes us on a journey to find Captain Captain's top Swashbuckle moments, her classic clips, which are all hidden along a pirate treasure map.

programme.desc: The Train Badge - Duggee the lovable dog runs a club where children have adventures.

programme.desc: Timgad Ruins, Algeria - The Go Jetters visit Timgad in Algeria, but someone is playing games with their click-ons.

programme.desc: Gordon Gets the Giggles - Gordon becomes very worried when he gets a serious case of the giggles. He must find a way to control his laughter before it does any damage.

programme.title: Sarah And Duck S2 Ep29

programme.desc: Farm - Amare asks Stanley to help her on the farm. Stanley asks Little Woo, Fred and Fifi to join him in sowing seeds, watering plants and picking apples, all whilst having fun.

programme.desc: Honestly, Monty - Monty becomes nervous when he breaks Jeanie's project and doesn't know whether to tell her. He soon learns that you should always be honest.

programme.desc: Daddy Putdown - When Mum goes out to a baby shower, Dad takes charge of the girls' evening routine. But with Bluey missing Mum, Dad has to pull out all the games he knows to keep them entertained.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Andy and the Baby Humpback Whale - In this episode Andy, Jen and Scout head to the Pacific ocean, off the tropical islands of Hawaii, on a baby animal mission to see how a baby humpback whale prepares for its 5000 km migration North to the rich feeding grounds of Alaska.

programme.title: Dog Squad S2 Ep20
programme.desc: Mission: Day Off - Sylvie and Katrina stop to help Dawn from the toy shop, Harry the Baker and Pete the Postie on their way to the park cafe on their day off.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You wont find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of todays world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC313PereiravsAnkalaev
programme.desc: After a historic 2024 that saw him defend his UFC light heavyweight title three times with three knockouts, Brazilian superstar Alex Pereira begins the new year in Las Vegas with a main event clash against number one contender Magomed Ankalaev. Plus former interim lightweight champion Justin Gaithje battles Rafael Fiziev for the second time, and much much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep5
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep16
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Noche UFC: Lopes vs. Silva
programme.desc: Prelims - The third-annual Noche UFC event has landed at Frost Bank Center in San Antonio, Texas, on September 14, and fight fans in the Lone Star State will be treated to one of the most highly antcipated bouts of 2025 when featherweight contenders Diego Lopes and Jean Silva clash in the five-round main event. Fighting out of his adopted home of Puebla, Mexico, Lopes owns wins over Brian Ortega and Dan Ige, and following his five-round war with Alexander Volkanovski, hes eager to return against The Fighting Nerds Silva, a supreme finisher who has ended all five of his UFC victories before the final horn.

programme.title: Noche UFC: Lopes vs. Silva
programme.desc: Main Event - The third-annual Noche UFC event has landed at Frost Bank Center in San Antonio, Texas, on September 14, and fight fans in the Lone Star State will be treated to one of the most highly antcipated bouts of 2025 when featherweight contenders Diego Lopes and Jean Silva clash in the five-round main event. Fighting out of his adopted home of Puebla, Mexico, Lopes owns wins over Brian Ortega and Dan Ige, and following his five-round war with Alexander Volkanovski, hes eager to return against The Fighting Nerds Silva, a supreme finisher who has ended all five of his UFC victories before the final horn.

programme.title: UFC 319: Du Plessis vs. Chimaev
programme.desc: Prelims - UFC returns to United Center in the Windy City of Chicago on August 17 with a stacked UFC 319 event featuring one of the most highly anticipated middleweight title fights in years. South Africas Dricus Du Plessis has taken UFC by storm since arriving in the Octagon in 2020, and after winning the UFC middleweight crown against Sean Strickland, hes continued to dominate with wins over Israel Adesanya and Strickland in their February rematch. But many believe his toughest test to date will be unbeaten challenger Khamzat Chimaev, whose list of UFC victories includes the names of Robert Whittaker, Kamaru Usman and Gilbert Burns

programme.title: Noche UFC: Lopes vs. Silva
programme.desc: Prelims - The third-annual Noche UFC event has landed at Frost Bank Center in San Antonio, Texas, on September 14, and fight fans in the Lone Star State will be treated to one of the most highly antcipated bouts of 2025 when featherweight contenders Diego Lopes and Jean Silva clash in the five-round main event. Fighting out of his adopted home of Puebla, Mexico, Lopes owns wins over Brian Ortega and Dan Ige, and following his five-round war with Alexander Volkanovski, hes eager to return against The Fighting Nerds Silva, a supreme finisher who has ended all five of his UFC victories before the final horn.

programme.title: LIVE: UFC Fight Night: Ulberg vs. Reyes
programme.desc: Prelims - The UFCs return to Perth on September 28 will feature one of the most explosive members of the Anzac contingent, as New Zealands top light heavyweight contender, Carlos Ulberg attempts to make his case for a world title shot when he faces American standout Dominick Reyes. Winner of eight in a row with five finishes, Ulberg is peaking at the right time after back-to-back wins over Volkan Oezdemir and Jan Blachowicz, and now he has his sights set on ending the winning streak of Reyes, who has knocked out his last three opponents en route to this showdown at RAC Arena

Senior commentator Shi Chi Ping uses a unique perspective to analyze political and economic topics around the world. Provide audiences with in-depth analysis of global trends.

programme.title: Dreamscapes, Architectural Wonders S2

programme.title: News Decoder S1
